div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2294 Wadi Sofeggin, 250 km. SE of Tri- poli, 1965 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 32 AE Carthage: 31 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 144 [6]; 192 [25]) 1 Carthage mint (as SNGCop. 307) Disposition: Tripoli di Vita, Libya Antigua 1966 Suppl., p. 80, illus.
